content: Q3 Revenue grew by 15% due to increased digital sales.
Operating costs were reduced by 5% through cloud migration.
Critical stockouts occurred in the electronics category during November.
Average inventory turnover improved to 8.2x in 2024.
Churn risk is highest among users with less than 2 logins per month.
The 'Champions' segment increased by 400 members this quarter.
Cardiology readmission rate stands at 24.5%, requiring intervention.
Patient satisfaction improved to 4.5/5 after implementing digital intake.
